"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53edd2db63687240de320100#post_53edd2db63687240de320100

what if this numbed to everyday sexual things really affect you when you have sex.

(also some guy its saying porn addiction can cause rape and abuse of women)
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53edd30863687237c9710100#post_53edd30863687237c9710100
I don't know any hard facts but it probably could numb you to sex. I feel like you would get physically exhausted of it before then though. Like, I think you'd have to be going 5 or 6 times a day before you did significant damage.
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53edd454636872299da80000#post_53edd454636872299da80000

yeha, maybe its when you fap exccesively that it starts to bother.

but i kind of feel like i go far too much, 3 times a day, although with college being in the afternoon and me sleeping all the morning it has gone to 1-2.

also, this guy said he talked to porn addicts who said took ritalin, whad heavy depression, did drugs to feel better about themselves, were fired 3 times and dropped out of college 2 times, so i guess they had a lot more problems to beging with.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53edd5986368727c4f490100#post_53edd5986368727c4f490100
3 times a day would be a lot for me but I've got an unfortunate case of grandpa libido. I wouldn't be too worried about porn or wank addiction unless it gets in the way of your life.
